title: Dottie gets spanked
brief_description: Todd Haynes’ black comedy is set in 1950s suburbia where the TV heroine Dottie reigns supreme. When a young boy gets his chance to meet his idol, the series of events he witnesses transforms his fantasy life. This is where childhood’s end begins.
